Detailed Description

Representation of measurement.

See the package documentation for definition of the coordinate frames and Euler angle conventions used.

Member Enumeration Documentation

◆ Index

enum ackermann_ekf::Measurement::Index : int

Indecies of components in z.

Enumerator
X 

x component of position vector in global frame

Y 

y component of position vector in global frame

Z 

z component of position vector in global frame

dx_dt 

Time derivative of x component of position vector in local frame (forward velocity)

dy_dt 

Time derivative of y component of position vector in local frame

dz_dt 

Time derivative of z component of position vector in local frame

d2x_dt2 

Second time derivative of x component of position vector in local frame (forward acceleration)

d2y_dt2 

Second time derivative of y component of position vector in local frame

d2z_dt2 

Second time derivative of z component of position vector in local frame

Roll 

Roll in global frame

Pitch 

Pitch in global frame

Yaw 

Yaw in global frame

droll_dt 

Time derivative of roll in local frame

dpitch_dt 

Time derivative of pitch in local frame

dyaw_dt 

Time derivative of yaw in local frame

SIZE 

Size of measurement vector z
